topicSummary: Mastitis is a painful inflammatory condition of the breast which may or may not be accompanied by infection. It is usually associated with lactation

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Mastitis and breast abscess: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Adverse effects updated within prescribing information - metronidazole.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: The Prescribing information section has been updated to reflect manufacturer's Summary of Product Characteristics in relation to a drug interaction between macrolides and calcium channel blockers.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in July 2015 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. No major changes to recommendations have been made; however, the scope of the topic has been changed as follows:
